content.raw:
Thank you Steven.

The above output is already the verbose output. And cppcheck is already installed.

```
#!bash

➜  build apt show cppcheck
Package: cppcheck
Version: 1.82-1
Priority: optional
Section: universe/devel
Origin: Ubuntu
Maintainer: Ubuntu Developers <ubuntu-devel-discuss@lists.ubuntu.com>
Original-Maintainer: Joachim Reichel <reichel@debian.org>
Bugs: https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+filebug
Installed-Size: 3,660 kB
```
